courseDescription:
Do you want to be an effective manager and improve the overall performance of your organization? Or you are a non-HR manager who wants to increase your HR knowledge and skills for effective and efficient people management in your team? If yes, then this free online course is best suited to you. It introduces you to all the advanced techniques and processes of human resource management. Understand key principles of HR like resource management, people management, and organizational development. By the end of this free HR course, you will be better equipped and more confident to manage people and increase overall organizational performance.

This free online training focuses on the best practices for finding, interviewing, onboarding, and managing human resources. It is divided into different modules to help facilitate your learning. Step by step, learn all the levels and processes required for initiating and conducting effective and successful recruitment and hiring drives. You will be guided on various techniques of interviews, selections, and other required HR metrics like performance management, training, and development. Learn HR functions like discipline and documentation, managing career progression, performance management, training, and developing competencies. As a bonus, you also receive all the professionally produced templates and formats as downloadable resources.

This course is perfect for non-HR managers who want to improve their leadership and people management skills to become more effective and efficient. It is also well designed for those HR professionals who want to improve and better their abilities and get comfortable with all the latest HR techniques and trends. Join now and be ready to create an impact by methodically managing resources, people, and company performance. Enroll to this free course now, and gain all the skills and knowledge to develop you and your team as an effective, professional, and successful entity.
